content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
This is a reminder of the plan for the next release:
https://isabelle-dev.sketis.net/phame/post/view/69/plan_for_isabelle2024_release

The hot phase of the release process is scheduled for 03-Apr..15-May-2023.

Now is a good time to think about what needs to be "in" the release.

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
